DataElement.preferredName: Person Family Medical History Cardiac Event Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text describing the cardiac health and disease events of a person's family members and ancestors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Family Medical History Cardiac Event
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._Chronological record of health and disease events of family members and ancestors. (WEBS84)___Having to do with the heart._Event; something that happens at a given place and time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:Chronological record of health and disease events of family members and ancestors. (WEBS84)

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the heart.:Event; something that happens at a given place and time.

Concepts.definition: Having to do with the heart.
Something that happens at a given place and time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text description of health and disease events of family members and ancestors.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Chronological record of health and disease events of family members and ancestors. (WEBS84):Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Please write down who from yo
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please write down who from your relatives had the event and his/her/their age at the time of the event, if known:
